Room.Name: Broken Wall
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a very close section of a broken wall in the Uland Temple.
Room.LongDescription: You really can't go anywhere from here, except back to the passage. There is a small hole in the floor, but the only way you could possibly go down it would be if you removed everything you are wearing. It's a very small opening, and it looks like you probably could not come back up.
